code: import React from"react";import{Link}from"react-router-dom";import"../stylesheets/CharacterDetail.scss";import Header from"./Header";import deadIco from"../images/dead.png";import aliveIco from"../images/heart.svg";import questionIco from"../images/question.svg";import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";var CharacterDetail=function CharacterDetail(props){var statusIcon=function statusIcon(){if(props.character.status==="Dead"){return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{className:"status-icon",src:deadIco,alt:"dead icon",title:"dead"});}else if(props.character.status==="Alive"){return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{className:"status-icon",src:aliveIco,alt:"alive icon",title:"alive"});}else if(props.character.status==="unknown"){return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{className:"status-icon",src:questionIco,alt:"unknown icon",title:"unknown"});}};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Header,{}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("main",{className:"main-detail",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Link,{to:"/",className:"home-link",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("i",{className:"fas fa-angle-double-left"})," Volver"]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("article",{className:"article",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{className:"article__img",src:props.character.picture,alt:props.character.name}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("ul",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("li",{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{children:props.character.name})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("li",{children:["Status: ",statusIcon()]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("li",{children:["Species: ",props.character.species]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("li",{children:["Origin: ",props.character.planet]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("li",{children:["Episodes number: ",props.character.episodesNumber]})]})]})]})]});};export default CharacterDetail;
